message.content: "Given the following text, please identify and extract all instances of the specified entities. The entities to look for are [Entity 1, Entity 2, Entity 3, etc.]. Here is the text: [Insert Text Here]. Please format your response as a list, with each entity instance on a separate line."

standardized_response.missing_information: Could you provide more details on the type of entities you want to extract? Are they named entities such as persons, organizations, or locations? Or more specific entities like dates, numbers, product types or other unique identifiers? In addition, if you could elaborate on the language or languages that the text in question will be in, that would be helpful too.
